subject: fix(db): add Dexie v3 migration for sourceId/targetId → source/target data
body:
The v2 schema bump (commit 65bdc4c) renamed the Dexie *indexes* from
sourceId/targetId to source/target but did not migrate the actual stored
objects. Users who visited before that rename have arcs in IndexedDB with
sourceId/targetId properties — arc.source is undefined, crashing
Cytoscape with "Can not create edge with unspecified source".

Adds a Dexie version 3 upgrade callback that renames sourceId→source
and targetId→target in all stored arcs. Also adds defensive filtering
in GraphCanvas to skip arcs with falsy or dangling source/target
references, logging skipped arcs via debugLog so the debug pill
surfaces the issue rather than silently swallowing it.
